text: @SpeakerPelosi @WHO Hey Nancy, is it true that Bill Gates owns the patent to the Coronavirus?And if yes, who is responsible for the deaths that those patent holders hold and would and could they be charged globally or universally for the high crimes of global pandemics? Would the UN or USA handle it
